nodes.text: Rille Nuder was a Human male representative of the Imperial Environmental Preservation & Refocusing Authority during the Galactic Civil War, a conflict fought between the Galactic Empire and the Rebel Alliance.

Rille Nuder was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. The game was shut down on December 15, 2011.
